name: Ghouls Just Wanna Have Fun
description:
Support the charity: https://donate.tiltify.com/@vimlark/pumpkins-and-pixels

Made By Vimlark and CupOhJoe for the Gamers Outreach Spooktacular Streamathon. 

Mouse or touch controls.
m - toggle mute (no music)

Knock over the targets to get 1 point. Knocking over the target while the multiplier ghost is over it will give you points equal to the multiplier and increase it by one. Get the highest score you can in 30 seconds. 

See how the game was made.
